participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and enthusiastic, loves to nurture and inspire others.
participant_1.background: I cherish my dog's ashes. I play games at the arcade, still. I got married to my high school friend. I'm from a small town in the Midwest. My favorite food is spicy tex mex.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and thoughtful, always looking to learn and grow.
participant_2.background: My family and business are my top priorities. I remember buying a video game console so I can play with my son. I like to spend my days reading and watching documentaries to learn more about the world. I am a librarian. I'm always trying to come up with new beats for my band.

content.text: Hi! What do you do for a living?
I am a librarian. I love my job. How about you?
I am a teacher! I really enjoy working with kids.
What grade do you teach?
I teach third grade. It is my favorite grade to teach.
That is awesome! I have always wanted to be a teacher.
It is a great job! But it can be challenging.
I know! I am sure it is!
What is your favorite thing about being a librarian?
I love helping people find information. I also love getting to see people's faces light up when they find what they are looking for.
That is so great! I love seeing the excitement on my students faces when they learn something new.
I know! It is the best feeling.
I also love watching my students grow and learn.
That is amazing! I am sure you are a great teacher!
Thanks! I try my best.
I am sure you do!
So, what is your favorite food?
I love spicy food! My favorite food is spicy tex-mex.
That sounds delicious! I love spicy food too!
Awesome! We should have lunch together sometime!
That sounds like a great idea!
Great! I will text you my number.
Sounds good
